main_definition: Aberdeen is a city in Scotland, or it can refer to various institutions, organizations, places, and expressions associated with this city.

meanings_and_examples.example: I visited Aberdeen last summer. It's a beautiful coastal city.
Aberdeen University is one of the oldest universities in Europe, with over 10,000 students.
The Aberdeen shipyards have been a cornerstone of Scotland's maritime history for centuries.
Aberdeen FC, also known as the Dons, is one of the most successful football clubs in Scottish history.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Term used to describe cold and windy weather
meanings_and_examples.example: The weather today reminds me of Aberdeen; it's so chilly!
